getIdentity.label: Get Identity
getIdentity.description: Fetch an identity by its identifier.

getIdentityUnproved.label: Get Identity (Unproved)
getIdentityUnproved.description: Fetch an identity without requesting cryptographic proofs.

getIdentityKeys.label: Get Identity Keys
getIdentityKeys.description: Retrieve public keys for an identity, including support for specific key IDs or purpose searches.

inputs.name: purposeMap
inputs.label: Search Purpose Map
inputs.help: JSON map of purpose -> security level -> filter (e.g. {"0": {"0": "current"}}).

getIdentitiesContractKeys.label: Get Contract Keys for Identities
getIdentitiesContractKeys.description: Fetch contract-specific keys for one or more identities.

getIdentityNonce.label: Get Identity Nonce
getIdentityNonce.description: Retrieve the global nonce associated with an identity.

getIdentityContractNonce.label: Get Identity Contract Nonce
getIdentityContractNonce.description: Retrieve the per-contract nonce for an identity.

getIdentityBalance.label: Get Identity Balance
getIdentityBalance.description: Fetch the credit balance for an identity.

getIdentitiesBalances.label: Get Multiple Identity Balances
getIdentitiesBalances.description: Fetch balances for multiple identities in a single request.

getIdentityBalanceAndRevision.label: Get Identity Balance & Revision
getIdentityBalanceAndRevision.description: Retrieve both the balance and revision number for an identity.

getIdentityByPublicKeyHash.label: Get Identity by Unique Public Key Hash
getIdentityByPublicKeyHash.description: Lookup an identity via its unique public key hash.

getIdentityByNonUniquePublicKeyHash.label: Get Identity by Non-Unique Public Key Hash
getIdentityByNonUniquePublicKeyHash.description: Lookup identities that match a non-unique public key hash.

inputs.name: startAfter
inputs.label: Start After (Key ID)
inputs.help: Resume pagination using the previous key identifier.

getIdentityTokenBalances.label: Get Identity Token Balances
getIdentityTokenBalances.description: Retrieve balances for a set of token IDs held by an identity.

getIdentitiesTokenBalances.label: Get Token Balances for Identities
getIdentitiesTokenBalances.description: Fetch balances for multiple identities for a single token.

getIdentityTokenInfos.label: Get Identity Token Info
getIdentityTokenInfos.description: Retrieve token metadata and balances for an identity.

getIdentitiesTokenInfos.label: Get Token Info for Identities
getIdentitiesTokenInfos.description: Retrieve token metadata for multiple identities for a single token.

getDataContract.label: Get Data Contract
getDataContract.description: Fetch a data contract by its identifier.

getDataContractHistory.label: Get Data Contract History
getDataContractHistory.description: Retrieve the version history for a data contract.

getDataContracts.label: Get Data Contracts
getDataContracts.description: Fetch multiple data contracts by their identifiers.

getDocuments.label: Get Documents
getDocuments.description: Query documents from a data contract using optional filters.

inputs.name: startAfter
inputs.label: Start After
inputs.help: Document ID or index value to resume from.

getDocument.label: Get Document
getDocument.description: Fetch a specific document by ID.

getDpnsUsername.label: Get Primary Username
getDpnsUsername.description: Fetch the primary DPNS username for an identity.

getDpnsUsernames.label: List Usernames for Identity
getDpnsUsernames.description: Fetch all DPNS usernames owned by an identity.

getDpnsUsernameByName.label: Get Username by Name
getDpnsUsernameByName.description: Fetch DPNS username details by full name.

dpnsResolve.label: Resolve DPNS Name
dpnsResolve.description: Resolve a DPNS name to its identity information.

dpnsCheckAvailability.label: Check DPNS Availability
dpnsCheckAvailability.description: Check if a DPNS label is available for registration.

dpnsConvertToHomographSafe.label: Convert to Homograph Safe
dpnsConvertToHomographSafe.description: Convert a label to its homograph-safe representation.

dpnsIsValidUsername.label: Validate Username
dpnsIsValidUsername.description: Validate whether a label conforms to DPNS username rules.

dpnsIsContestedUsername.label: Is Contested Username
dpnsIsContestedUsername.description: Check if a label is currently part of a contested DPNS registration.

getContestedResources.label: Get Contested Resources
getContestedResources.description: List contested resources for a document type and index.

inputs.name: startIndexValues
inputs.label: Start Index Values
inputs.help: Optional lower bound for range queries.

inputs.name: endIndexValues
inputs.label: End Index Values
inputs.help: Optional upper bound for range queries.

getContestedResourceVoteState.label: Get Contested Resource Vote State
getContestedResourceVoteState.description: Retrieve vote tallies for a contested resource.

getContestedResourceVotersForIdentity.label: Get Voters for Identity
getContestedResourceVotersForIdentity.description: List voters that voted for a specific identity in a contested resource.

getContestedResourceIdentityVotes.label: Get Identity Votes
getContestedResourceIdentityVotes.description: Fetch contested resource votes submitted by a particular identity.

getVotePollsByEndDate.label: Get Vote Polls by End Date
getVotePollsByEndDate.description: Fetch vote polls filtered by end time using millisecond timestamps.

getProtocolVersionUpgradeVoteStatus.label: Get Protocol Version Vote Status
getProtocolVersionUpgradeVoteStatus.description: Fetch voting status for masternodes on protocol upgrades.

getEpochsInfo.label: Get Epochs Info
getEpochsInfo.description: Retrieve summary information for one or more epochs.

getFinalizedEpochInfos.label: Get Finalized Epoch Infos
getFinalizedEpochInfos.description: Retrieve finalized epoch information for a range.

getEvonodesProposedEpochBlocksByIds.label: Get Epoch Blocks by Evonode IDs
getEvonodesProposedEpochBlocksByIds.description: Fetch proposed blocks for specific evonode ProTx hashes.

getEvonodesProposedEpochBlocksByRange.label: Get Epoch Blocks by Range
getEvonodesProposedEpochBlocksByRange.description: Fetch proposed blocks in range order.

calculateTokenId.label: Calculate Token ID
calculateTokenId.description: Calculate a token ID from a contract ID and token position. This is a utility method that does not require network connection.

getTokenStatuses.label: Get Token Statuses
getTokenStatuses.description: Retrieve status information for one or more tokens.

getTokenDirectPurchasePrices.label: Get Direct Purchase Prices
getTokenDirectPurchasePrices.description: Fetch direct purchase prices for tokens.

getTokenContractInfo.label: Get Token Contract Info
getTokenContractInfo.description: Retrieve metadata for a token contract.

getTokenPerpetualDistributionLastClaim.label: Get Token Distribution Last Claim
getTokenPerpetualDistributionLastClaim.description: Fetch the last perpetual distribution claim for an identity and token.

getTokenTotalSupply.label: Get Token Total Supply
getTokenTotalSupply.description: Fetch the total supply for a token.

getTokenPriceByContract.label: Get Token Price by Contract
getTokenPriceByContract.description: Retrieve the price details for a token indexed by contract position.

getGroupInfo.label: Get Group Info
getGroupInfo.description: Fetch metadata for a specific group contract position.

getGroupInfos.label: List Group Infos
getGroupInfos.description: List group information entries for a contract.

getGroupMembers.label: Get Group Members
getGroupMembers.description: Retrieve member entries for a group.

getGroupActions.label: Get Group Actions
getGroupActions.description: Fetch actions associated with a group.

getGroupActionSigners.label: Get Group Action Signers
getGroupActionSigners.description: List signers for a specific group action.

getIdentityGroups.label: Get Identity Groups
getIdentityGroups.description: Fetch group memberships for an identity.

getGroupsDataContracts.label: Get Groups Data Contracts
getGroupsDataContracts.description: Fetch group configuration documents for the supplied data contracts.

getCurrentQuorumsInfo.label: Get Current Quorums Info
getCurrentQuorumsInfo.description: Fetch details about currently active quorums.

getPrefundedSpecializedBalance.label: Get Prefunded Specialized Balance
getPrefundedSpecializedBalance.description: Retrieve a prefunded specialized balance entry.

getTotalCreditsInPlatform.label: Get Total Credits in Platform
getTotalCreditsInPlatform.description: Fetch the total credit balance stored in the platform.

getPathElements.label: Get Path Elements
getPathElements.description: Access items in the GroveDB state tree by specifying a path and keys.

waitForStateTransitionResult.label: Wait for State Transition Result
waitForStateTransitionResult.description: Wait for a state transition to be processed and return the result.

getPlatformAddress.label: Get Platform Address
getPlatformAddress.description: Fetch information about a Platform address including its nonce and balance.
getPlatformAddress.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

getPlatformAddresses.label: Get Multiple Platform Addresses
getPlatformAddresses.description: Fetch information about multiple Platform addresses.
getPlatformAddresses.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

identityCreate.label: Identity Create
identityCreate.description: Create a new identity with initial credits

inputs.name: seedPhrase
inputs.label: Seed Phrase
inputs.placeholder: Enter seed phrase (12-24 words) or click Generate
inputs.help: The wallet seed phrase that will be used to derive identity keys

inputs.name: identityIndex
inputs.label: Identity Index
inputs.help: The identity index is an internal reference within the wallet. Leave as 0 for first identity.

inputs.name: keySelectionMode
inputs.label: Key Selection Mode
inputs.help: Default adds standard keys for most Platform operations. Advanced allows custom key configuration.

inputs.name: keyPreview
inputs.label: Keys to be added
inputs.help: These keys will be added to your new identity

sdk_params.name: publicKeys
sdk_params.label: Public Keys
sdk_params.description: JSON array of public keys. Key requirements: ECDSA_SECP256K1 requires privateKeyHex or privateKeyWif for signing, BLS12_381 requires privateKeyHex for signing, ECDSA_HASH160 requires either the data field (base64-encoded 20-byte public key hash) or privateKeyHex (produces empty signatures).

identityTopUp.label: Identity Top Up
identityTopUp.description: Add credits to an existing identity

inputs.name: identityId
inputs.label: Identity ID
inputs.placeholder: Enter the identity ID to top up (base58)
inputs.help: The identity ID that will receive the credits from the asset lock proof

identityCreditWithdrawal.label: Identity Credit Withdrawal
identityCreditWithdrawal.description: Withdraw credits from identity to Dash address

dataContractUpdate.label: Data Contract Update
dataContractUpdate.description: Add document types, groups, or tokens to an existing data contract

tokenSetPriceForDirectPurchase.label: Token Set Price
tokenSetPriceForDirectPurchase.description: Set or update the price for direct token purchases

inputs.name: priceData
inputs.label: Price Data (single price or JSON map)

tokenDirectPurchase.label: Token Direct Purchase
tokenDirectPurchase.description: Purchase tokens directly at the configured price

inputs.name: totalAgreedPrice
inputs.label: Total Agreed Price (in credits) - Optional, fetches from pricing schedule if not provided

tokenEmergencyAction.label: Token Emergency Action
tokenEmergencyAction.description: Perform an emergency action on a token

tokenFreeze.label: Token Freeze
tokenFreeze.description: Freeze tokens for a specific identity

tokenUnfreeze.label: Token Unfreeze
tokenUnfreeze.description: Unfreeze tokens for a specific identity

inputs.name: frozenIdentityId
inputs.label: Identity ID whose frozen tokens to destroy

dpnsUsername.label: DPNS Username
dpnsUsername.description: Cast a vote for a contested DPNS username

inputs.name: targetIdentity
inputs.label: Target Identity ID (if voting for identity)

masternodeVote.label: Contested Resource
masternodeVote.description: Cast a vote for contested resources as a masternode

inputs.name: contractId
inputs.label: Data Contract ID
inputs.placeholder: Contract ID containing the contested resource

inputs.name: targetIdentity
inputs.label: Target Identity ID (if voting for identity)

addressTransfer.label: Address Transfer
addressTransfer.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

sdk_params.name: inputs
sdk_params.label: Inputs
sdk_params.description: Array of {address, nonce, amount (credits)} objects for sender addresses

sdk_params.name: outputs
sdk_params.label: Outputs
sdk_params.description: Array of {address, amount (credits)} objects for recipient addresses

addressTopUpIdentity.label: Top Up Identity from Address
addressTopUpIdentity.description: Top up an identity using Platform address credits
addressTopUpIdentity.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

sdk_params.name: identityId
sdk_params.label: Identity ID
sdk_params.description: Base58 identity ID to top up

addressWithdraw.label: Withdraw to Core
addressWithdraw.description: Withdraw Platform address credits to Dash Core
addressWithdraw.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

sdk_params.name: coreFeePerByte
sdk_params.label: Core Fee Per Byte
sdk_params.description: Fee per byte for Core transaction

addressTransferFromIdentity.label: Transfer from Identity to Address
addressTransferFromIdentity.description: Transfer credits from an identity to Platform addresses
addressTransferFromIdentity.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

sdk_params.name: identityId
sdk_params.label: Identity ID
sdk_params.description: Base58 identity ID to transfer from

sdk_params.name: outputs
sdk_params.label: Outputs
sdk_params.description: Array of {address, amount (credits)} objects for recipient addresses

addressFundFromAssetLock.label: Fund Address from Asset Lock
addressFundFromAssetLock.description: Fund Platform addresses from an asset lock
addressFundFromAssetLock.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK

sdk_params.name: assetLockPrivateKey
sdk_params.label: Asset Lock Private Key
sdk_params.description: WIF private key for asset lock

addressCreateIdentity.label: Create Identity from Address
addressCreateIdentity.description: Create a new identity funded from Platform addresses
addressCreateIdentity.disabled: Platform addresses not fully implemented in SDK
